issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: Include the filename in the IOException thrown by ORC reader.
fields.summary: IOException thrown by ORC should include the path of processing file

comments.body: [~gopalv] Can you review this patch? I just added try..catch in next() and nextBatch() methods. Others diffs are just formatting changes.

LGTM - +1.

Added to perf test, might have a couple of minor changes after checking JIT assembly.

{color:red}Overall{color}: -1 at least one tests failed

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12702226/HIVE-9841.1.patch

{color:red}ERROR:{color} -1 due to 472 failed/errored test(s), 7516 tests executed
*Failed tests:*
{noformat}
TestCliDriver-acid_vectorization.q-alter3.q-smb_mapjoin_2.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
TestCliDriver-avro_add_column.q-orc_wide_table.q-query_with_semi.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
TestCliDriver-index_compact_2.q-vectorized_bucketmapjoin1.q-input0.q-and-12-more - did not produce a TEST-*.xml file
